data.name: VR Fractals Demo
data.detailed_description:
VR Fractals is a 3D Fractal Viewer for the Oculus Rift and the HTC Vive. To use this you must have one of those headsets.

The full version is an experience similar to Oculus Dreamdeck, so expect about 5-20 minutes of gameplay in the full version for the price of a large candy bar. This is a demo that is available for free, and contains one fractal and no editor that should give you a pretty good jist of what to expect.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A free demo of a 3D Fractal Viewer in VR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: AMD 290, Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
